WRITING.TITLE: F22 update post. Got diagnosed with anorexia and bdd. 96lbs-110.
WRITING.TEXT:
Hey. I posted here asking if i would look better if i lost weight. (Check my history for pix if youre curious).
You guys told me i didnt need to lose anything but i felt like i was fat still and you told me i might have anorexia. I went to a doctor and i got diagnosed. Im now on a new diet and its really tough. I cant eat much food without feeling horrible and i feel like im getting fatter and fatter and uglier and uglier still. I know people say im not but it still feels that way. Ive gone up from 96lbs to 110 since. I have alot more energy now to do stuff. Before i just layed at home doing nothing but reading and homework..
just wanna say thank you guys that you helped me on the right path! Heres some update pix, hope i look a little different atleast.:)
http://m.imgur.com/a/TS42u
But i just need to lose some weight..
I think thats maybe too much. I was thinking 10 maybe

WRITING.TITLE: 22f how much weight should i lose to look better?
22f how much weight should i lose to become sexy?

WRITING.TEXT:
might aswell delete this sub and post a pic that says eat less food.
Would i be appreciated if i went to every post here and said "eat less food?"
sounds like someone had a bad day. dont take that out on me when im legit looking for advice in a sub thats for losing weight. sorry for doing whats intended of it . best mod eveeeer
how am i fishing for compliments?
